meta.name: viewport
meta.title: BISD Front Door

div.p: Please Check Out BISD Social Media Links Below - Let's Stay Connected, Buckaroos!

In response to the county, state, and federal public health recommendations and emergency decla-rations, Breckenridge ISD will remain closed indefinitely. When public health officials determine that schools can safely reopen, the Breckenridge ISD community will be notified with sufficient time to plan to return to school. Please see the below Home Learning web page.

span.a:
BISD Home Learning &
Coronavirus Update Web Page

div.p:
from Mark Nelson, BISD Director
of Food Services

Buckaroo Mobile Web is ready to use. This website was made just for smart phones. In your phone's browser, type Breckenridge ISD into the search engine; then, click on that link, and you will be redirected to the new mobile web. Go, Bucks, Go!

div.span: Welcome to the 2019-2020 School Year! We are super-glad you are here! Go, Bucks!

BISD also utilizes a mobile website, made just for smart phones. Open your browser on your smart phone and type in the search engine "Breckenridge ISD." Click on the hyperlink, and you will automatically be redirected to the Buckaroo Mobile Web.
There are several campus and program-based Facebook pages. Just above you will see a listing of them. That's one of the best methods for staying in touch with Buckaroo programs and activities.
Thank You for visiting our BISD websites. Go, Bucks, Go!

Be sure to check out our BISD Online Video Announcements. Hannah Pennartz, Shaden Bills, and Mia Hughins co-host these informative weekly announcements, showcasing the many good things going on from all around our school district. These announcements are posted in the above drop down menu under "Calendar" and on mobile web.

script.onload: if (requirejs) requirejs.onError = function(requireType, requireModule) { if (requireType && requireType.toString && requireType.toString().indexOf && 0 <= requireType.toString().indexOf('#scripterror')) window.Muse.assets.check(); }
